Room.Name: North Highway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on North Highway, passing by the eastern side of Golgoth Mountain.
Room.LongDescription: Deep crevices and valleys run east to west on the eastern side of the Highway. They appear to form a labrynth of interconnecting passages where one might become lost, were he to venture into them. An old map tacked to the wall of the Boar's Arse Pub marks this area as the home of a large number of hobbits.
